data.text: @kevinlovestech @hgtvcanada I agree.. the original series is what made the show. The kids house (blah) and the "let me go to America and teach people what to look for" was just dumb. No interest in the shows for the 1%. HGTV execs have lost their way.

@CommonSenseSoc @hgtvcanada I saw a few episodes of the first season last year. It basically focused on the home renos of the son's house, which I don't care about.

I love watching other Holmes shows. Helping everyday families with home repairs screwed up by bad contractors or missed by inspectors.
